Description: Round-based bowl of dull red pottery: with a polished bright red slip on the interior and exterior. The bowl has a recurved rim. Restored from fragments.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: G. Brunton, 'Qau and Badari' I (London, 1927), pl. XI and pl. XIII, type 37M.
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
